thread.title: Affordable Xiaomi Mi4c Flagship Launches with Cool “Edge Tap” Feature
thread.title_full: Affordable Xiaomi Mi4c Flagship Launches with Cool “Edge Tap” Feature - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Affordable Xiaomi Mi4c Flagship Launches with Cool “Edge Tap” Feature
text: As it was anticipated for the past month or so, today Chinese device maker Xiaomi has unveiled the Mi4c, an improved version of the Mi4i which launched back in April in India. By comparison, this version will be offered exclusively on the Chinese market (but third-party re-sellers will probably pick it up too). The Mi4c makes a debut into the wild with a 5-inch Sunlight Display (the ... »
